data.name: Mineralis
data.detailed_description:
Japanese role-playing game about forgiveness and personal growth.
Embark on a journey across the continent of Mineralis, making friends and foes along the way.

Will you survive through its treacherous forests, goblin settlements, and perilous desert?

Including but not limited to the following:


  • Japanese RPG gameplay inspired by the classics
  • A story that really is influenced by your every decision
  • Elegant hand-crafted combat with challenging tactics
  • Different perspectives on life's biggest hurdles
  • Thoughts on cutting-edge technology
  • A goblin barkeep

Designed for meaning from the ground up.

Mineralis can be completed within several hours, while still offering replayability and extra challenges for those who desire them. No filler content.


See you in Mobius Village!

This game is not suitable for children
or those who are easily disturbed.

data.short_description: Think, talk, and fight through moral dilemmas and hand-crafted Japanese RPG combat. Test your tactical mastery. Become a better person. Gain karma and create history in a land torn by conflict. Do you have what it takes to overcome fate?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum display resolution 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10, or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or more
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum display resolution 1280x720

Recommended:

  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or more
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
